Your New Mom ->{{champion:79}}

I'm wondering how the Dragon's entrance is going to affect gameplay for the bot lane. Suppose the jungler comes to gank bot lane and they get a double kill. They run to dragon. Well while they are waiting for the Dragon's entrance animation, the other lanes have returned via teleport or something before the Dragon is even engaged. Honestly, this goes for all jungle creeps. Are these intros going to affect champions like {{champion:64}} , {{champion:412}} or {{champion:55}} ?

No, these introductions will have 0 impact because the introductions start before the spawn really happens. For instance if dragon is timed to spawn at 15:30, it will start the intro animation at about 15:25. This has all already been previously explained by rioteers on the previous summoner's rift update video in the comments, it's not just me speculating.

I'm worried about junglers like lee sin w/ jumps to minions when they have an animation for entering, especially dragon and lee sin.
that animation doesn't play every time you show up. only when the monster first appears,and it isnt actually targetable until the animation is done. the animation will play even if no one can see it

The start of the animation does not reflect the spawn time of the camp/boss. The animations finish in accordance to the respawn timer; basically if dragon were to respawn at 15:30 and the introduction takes 5 seconds, the intro animation will begin at 15:25. This has been said by Riot already, not my personal speculation.
But Rito, how can I focus on fighting enemies when Summo-new's Rift is so pretty (I regret nothing)
